attributes.action: Financially support mothers who want to stay at home and care for their children.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is for all those mothers who chose to become mothers to bring up children. The government should pay stay at home mothers a 'wage' regardless of their partners income, as being a mother is a full time job. Why should mothers be forced into getting a full time job just to support the wages of their child minder!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
